arts.ttl: Barcelona predicted XI vs Newcastle United as Hansi Flick set to hand €12m player first start of 25/26 season
arts.sum: The first encounter for FC Barcelona in this season’s UEFA Champions League is coming up shortly. Heading over to England, the Catalan giants will be taking on Premier League side Newcastle United away from home following their recent victory over Valencia. arts.ttl: Hansi Flick has some tough decisions to make ahead of Newcastle vs Barcelona
arts.sum: After three consecutive unconvincing performances in La Liga, Barcelona players responded brilliantly this past weekend by securing a 6-0 win over Valencia at Estadi Johan Cruyff.
